Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Select a set of modified stage files. These will remove redundant overrides for Sonic's physics in some stages, allowing him to handle more consistently.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Choose whether Modern Sonic will have the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button or the Jump button. (Note that the HedgeModManager 'Homing Attack on Boost' code by SWS90 will override this choice.)
Load files to remove overrides from the standard game's levels.
Load files to remove overrides from Unleashed Project 1.0's levels.
Load no alternate stage files. Recommended for use with other stage mods.
Map the Homing Attack to the Boost button.
Map the Homing Attack to the Jump button.
